html: He giveth power to the faint. God has given all of us the breath of life, and he "is preserving [us] from day to day, by lending [us] breath,…and even supporting [us] from one moment to another" (Mosiah 2:21). Without his power we would be nothing; we would not exist. Even the "youths" and "young men," those who are in the prime of life, "shall utterly fall" without God's power upholding them (40:30).
